person.persName: Thomas Edgar Burns (Fleming Co., KY, merchant and lieut. col. 16th Inf (U.S.A.))

body.p: Fleming County, Kentucky, merchant and soldier. Nicholas County, Kentucky, native. Son of Alvin Burns and Amanda J. Burns. Student in Nicholas County in 1850. Merchant in Fleming County, Kentucky, in 1860. Served in the 16th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry (U.S.A) as lieutenant, captain, major and lieutenant colonel from October 14, 1861, to June 15, 1864.
